lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Local officials have payed great importance to Weizsaecker's visit because they consider him a key backer of more flexible repayment terms for Argentina's 51 billion dlr foreign debt, Latin America's third largest.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Weizsaecker, speaking at a reception held for him by President Raul Alfonsin at Buenos Aires' City Council hall, also said no one could overlook the enormity of the obstacle posed by the foreign debt to countries like Argentina.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: West German President Richard von Weizsaecker said both debtor and creditor nations share responsibility for the Third World's foreign debt crisis.
